mapper.insert: insert into zh_order_detail_info ( order_id, order_no, info_id, goods_weight, goods_volume, status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted )values ( #{orderId}, #{orderNo}, #{infoId}, #{goodsWeight}, #{goodsVolume}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now(), #{isDeleted} )
mapper.update: update zh_order_detail_info set order_id=#{orderId}, order_no=#{orderNo}, info_id=#{infoId}, goods_weight=#{goodsWeight}, goods_volume=#{goodsVolume}, status=#{status}, updated_by=#{updatedBy}, updated_time=now(), is_deleted=#{isDeleted} where order_id=#{orderId}

update zh_order_detail_info
order_id=#{orderId},
order_no=#{orderNo},
info_id=#{infoId},
goods_weight=#{goodsWeight},
goods_volume=#{goodsVolume},
status=#{status},
updated_by=#{updatedBy},
updated_time=now(),
is_deleted=#{isDeleted}
where order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_no, info_id, goods_weight, goods_volume, status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted from zh_order_detail_info where order_id=#{orderId}
